name: ICBM North Pole
description:
Pilot an orbital missile to destroy the north pole and ruin Christmas forever!
Made in 48 hours for Anti-Christmas Jam.
HTML Warning
In some browsers, the game will stop accepting input if you lose focus with it. I strongly recommend downloading a build for your computer if you can.
Credits
      Bread - Programming
      Lemmy - Visual Art
      Eli - Sound design
